channel.title: Newman on hack(pravj)

item.title: Newman Is Live
item.description: And finally, after working non-stop on the project for 45 days Newman is finally in beta. Newman is a command-line collection runner for Postman built fully on Node.js. Newman is my first-ever node.js project and I’m extremely glad to have got a chance to build something useful and learn a new technology. Newman Demo. Node has been on my radar for quite some time given its meteoric rise and hype.
